title: Rural Disease Burden Atlas
prompt: A weathered wooden table in soft morning light holds scattered papers—demographic charts, health statistics, regional maps—with a cup of coffee and reading glasses nearby, shot from above at a slight angle; muted earth-tone walls and a window casting long shadows in the background suggest a small-town office or community center; the composition conveys quiet documentation and methodical analysis without clinical sterility, emphasizing the human effort behind data collection in underserved regions.
